Oshiri no Yama wa Everest: The second music video for NHK's Minna no Uta program to feature UrumaDelvi's original butt-biting bug, five years after the original song was broadcast. We follow Oshiri Kajiri Mushi XVIII as he climbs Mount Everest in search of a legendary golden butt, yodelling all the way to the top.
